name: DB SCHENKER, AMERICAS REGION
sampleDescriptions: Seeking further information re the Base Erosion Anti-Abuse Tax (BEAT) approved into law during the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017.
Seeking further awareness included in the recent tax reform legislation
Address awareness for a new tax established in the recent Tax Reform Law
Seeking to remove the BEAT TAX as not applicable for a Service reoriented Company.
Visiting Members of Congress to inform them of the adverse conditions due to the 2017 BEAT TAX for a Service Oriented Company.
